name: yamtrack
tagline: A tracker for media consumption and activities
description: Yamtrack is a self-hosted media and activity tracker that logs what you watch, read, or play. It aggregates entries into timelines and statistics, giving a personal overview of consumption habits.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Track movies, TV shows, books, games, and other media you consume with manual or automated

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: View insights about your habits including total hours, favorite genres, and consumption patterns

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Bulk import viewing history from streaming services and reading lists from other platforms

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Create personalized categories and tags to organize media beyond standard classifications

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find past entries quickly with powerful search across titles, dates, and custom metadata
